mapper.select: select ec.title as title, ec.price as price, ec.lesson_num as lessonNum, ec.cover as cover, et.name as teacherName, es1.title as subjectLevelOne, es2.title as subjectLevelTwo from edu_course ec left join edu_course_description ecd on ec.id=ecd.id left join edu_teacher et on ec.teacher_id=et.id left join edu_subject es1 on ec.subject_parent_id=es1.id left join edu_subject es2 on ec.subject_id=es2.id where ec.id=#{id}
